author: AP
title: Coronavirus | African nations, US decry racism in Chinese city of Guangzhou
description: This is in response to a rise in virus infections in the city, the U.S. said, adding that “African-Americans have also reported that some businesses and hotels refuse to do business with them,” in a statement titled “Discrimination against African-Americans i…
content:
African officials are confronting China publicly and in private over racist mistreatment of Africans in the Chinese city of Guangzhou, and the U.S. says African-Americans have been targeted too.
